info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 5604
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;monsuivipsy.fabrique.social.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 5604
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;monsuivipsy.fabrique.social.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
fabrique.social.gouv.fr.	300	IN	SOA	ns1-06.azure-dns.com. azuredns-hostmaster.microsoft.com. 1 3600 300 2419200 300

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: monsuivipsy.fabrique.social.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently Connection: close Content-Length: 162 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; connect-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; font-src 'self'; media-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; img-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr https://a.tile.openstreetmap.org https://b.tile.openstreetmap.org https://c.tile.openstreetmap.org; prefetch-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; script-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; frame-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 12 May 2024 02:01:13 GMT Location: https://jardinmental.fabrique.social.gouv.fr/ Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: deny X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block 301 Moved Permanently

301 Moved Permanently

nginx

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: monsuivipsy.fabrique.social.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently Connection: close Content-Length: 162 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; connect-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; font-src 'self'; media-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; img-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr https://a.tile.openstreetmap.org https://b.tile.openstreetmap.org https://c.tile.openstreetmap.org; prefetch-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; script-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; frame-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 12 May 2024 02:02:11 GMT Location: https://jardinmental.fabrique.social.gouv.fr/ Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: deny X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block 301 Moved Permanently

nginx
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: monsuivipsy.fabrique.social.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://monsuivipsy.fabrique.social.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: Kubernetes Fake Ingress Certificate - Detect
author: kchason
info.description: Kubernetes Fake Ingress Certificate is a feature in Kubernetes that allows users to create and use fake or self-signed SSL/TLS certificates for testing purposes without having to obtain a real SSL/TLS certificate from a trusted Certificate Authority (CA).
info.remediation: Purchase or generate a proper SSL certificate for this service.

extracted-results: Issuer: Kubernetes Ingress Controller Fake Certificate

info.name: Mismatched SSL Certificate
author: pdteam
info.description: Mismatched certificates occur when there is inconsistency between the common name to which the certificate was issued and the domain name in the URL. This issue impacts the trust value of the affected website.

extracted-results: CN: Kubernetes Ingress Controller Fake Certificate

info.name: Self Signed SSL Certificate
author: righettod
pdteam
info.description:
self-signed certificates are public key certificates that are not issued by a certificate authority. These self-signed
certificates are easy to make and do not cost money. However, they do not provide any trust value.
info.remediation: Purchase or generate a proper SSL certificate for this service.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
